message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $14,000. I believe it will be of great value to you.
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go lower than $13,000. This product is worth a lot to me, and I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
I understand your position, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
